Package org.apache.logging.log4j.kit.env.support

Class BasicPropertyEnvironment

java.lang.Object
org.apache.logging.log4j.kit.env.support.BasicPropertyEnvironment
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyEnvironment
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassLoaderPropertyEnvironment, PropertiesUtilPropertyEnvironment
public abstract class BasicPropertyEnvironment extends Object implements PropertyEnvironment
An implementation of PropertyEnvironment that only uses basic Java functions.

Conversion problems are logged using a status logger.

      Gets the named property as a String.
      Specified by:
      getProperty in interface PropertyEnvironment
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the property to look up
      Returns:

    • getProperty

      public <T> T getProperty(Class<T> propertyClass)
      Description copied from interface: PropertyEnvironment
      Binds properties to class T.

      The implementation should at least support binding Java records with a single public constructor and enums.

      Specified by:
      getProperty in interface PropertyEnvironment
      Parameters:
      propertyClass - a class annotated by Log4jProperty.
      Returns:
      an instance of T with all JavaBean properties bound.
